messages.title: Election Communication
messages.content: Protect our NHS and fight Brexit

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are now the only opposition to a destructive Hard Brexit.

mentions.candidate: Ukonu Obasi will be a Champion for the people of Walthamstow.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn and Theresa May worked together to trigger Article 50. Stella Creasy's Labour Party will not guarantee that we will remain in the Single Market.

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats are now the only opposition to a destructive Hard Brexit. Stella Creasy's Labour Party will not guarantee that we will remain in the Single Market.
